verses.kjv: O come, let us sing unto the LORD: let us make a joyful noise to the rock of our salvation.
verses.ct: Come, let's sing to the LORD! Let's shout with joy to the rock who saves us.

verses.kjv: Let us come before his presence with thanksgiving, and make a joyful noise unto him with psalms.
verses.ct: Let's approach him with gratitude and celebrate him with songs of praise.

verses.kjv: For the LORD is a great God, and a great King above all gods.
verses.ct: Because the LORD is a mighty God, a great King who reigns over all gods.

verses.kjv: In his hand are the deep places of the earth: the strength of the hills is his also.
verses.ct: The deepest places of the earth are in his hands, and the towering mountains belong to him as well.

verses.kjv: The sea is his, and he made it: and his hands formed the dry land.
verses.ct: The ocean is his — he made it. His hands shaped the dry ground too.

verses.kjv: O come, let us worship and bow down: let us kneel before the LORD our maker.
verses.ct: Come, let's worship and bow low. Let's kneel in the presence of the LORD who created us.

verses.kjv: For he is our God; and we are the people of his pasture, and the sheep of his hand. To day if ye will hear his voice,
verses.ct: He is our God, and we are the people he cares for, the flock under his guidance. Today, if you hear his voice —

verses.kjv: Harden not your heart, as in the provocation, and as in the day of temptation in the wilderness:
verses.ct: don't harden your hearts like at Meribah, like that day of testing in the wilderness,

verses.kjv: When your fathers tempted me, proved me, and saw my work.
verses.ct: when your ancestors tested me, challenged me, even though they had witnessed what I did.

verses.kjv: Forty years long was I grieved with this generation, and said, It is a people that do err in their heart, and they have not known my ways:
verses.ct: "For 40 years I was frustrated with that generation, and I said, 'These people constantly go astray in their hearts, and they have never understood my ways.'

verses.kjv: Unto whom I sware in my wrath that they should not enter into my rest.
verses.ct: So in my anger I made an oath: 'They will never enter my place of rest.'"
